title: Gogglebox's George Gilbey jailed for drink-driving after being caught at petrol station

Gogglebox star George Gilbey has been jailed for three months for drink-driving.

During an appearance at Chelmsford Magistrates' Court on October 1, Gilbey, 35, pleaded guilty to a charge of driving a motor vehicle with an alcohol level above the legal limit.

The TV star, who also appeared on Celebrity Big Brother , was said to have been nearly three times over the limit when he was arrested after staff at a filling station smelt alcohol on him.

He's thought to have run out of fuel for his Vauxhall and walked to a Tesco where he asked staff for advice on filling up a can, according to The Sun .

Staff believed he had been drinking and called police.

Gilbey was then breathalysed and officers found he was almost three times over the legal limit.

(Image: SWNS.com)

The TV personality, of Clacton, Essex, admitted the charge at Chelmsford Magistrates' Court, where he was jailed due to the fact he was already serving a community punishment for attacking his ex-girlfriend in a drunken rage.

He was also banned from driving for five years.

Gilbey has appeared on the Channel 4 show with his parents, Linda and Peter, and they are currently starring in the latest series without him.

(Image: Internet Unknown)

The family were temporarily taken off the show while their son was appearing on CBB in 2014, and the couple, both 69, later returned without him,.

A spokesman for road safety charity Brake told the publication: "Drink driving puts lives at risk."
description: The TV star, who also appeared on Celebrity Big Brother, has also been banned from the roads for five years
